short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Research documents in the Vatican website using the searching power of Google, Bing or DuckDuckGo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Chrome extension simplifies your research on the Vatican website.

Whether you're a historian, theologian, or simply curious, our extension allows you to search specific sections of the Vatican website with ease.

Key Features:

- Focused Search: For example, search for words or phrases only in the documents of Pope Saint John Paul II, saving you time and frustration.

- Precision Results: Get exactly what you need without sifting through unrelated content.

-Uses the search power of Google, Bing or DuckDuckGo

Version 1.1.0:
- Added Bing and DuckDuckGo searchers
